Package ca.sfu.cmpt213.assignment2.model

Class Utility

java.lang.Object
ca.sfu.cmpt213.assignment2.model.Utility
public class Utility
extends java.lang.Object
Hosts a number of independent utility methods that streamlines in-game logic.

  • Method Details

    • locateDirection

      public static Coordinates locateDirection​(Coordinates currentCoordinates, Direction direction)
      Generate coordinates correspondent to direction relative to current position.
      Parameters:
      currentCoordinates - The position from which the detection will originate.
      direction - The direction to be detected.
      Returns:
      Coordinates corresponding to the input direction.

    • generateID

      public static int generateID​(java.util.ArrayList<Entity> entityList)
      Generates a random ID for each entity so that they could be identified. individually in the entities list. The ID is always unique from existing IDs in the entities list.
      Parameters:
      entityList - The entityList field of the current Handler.
      Returns:
      A random integer ID.

    • opposite

      public static Direction opposite​(Direction direction)
      Finds the direction opposite to current direction.
      Parameters:
      direction - Current direction.
      Returns:
      The opposite direction of current direction.
